dmca.title: DMCA Complaint for Nokia Portugal
dmca.body:
Dear all, 

My client Nokia Portugal. S.A. ("Nokia") ordered me to notify Google Technology Inc on the following: 

1. My client distributes in Portugal mobile phones Nokia and related equipment and software. 

2. Nokia is the owner of rights of mobile phone software and related software to blocking and unblocking the referred devices. 

3. Software is protected under Portuguese law by the Decree-Law 252/94, of October 20 in the scope of the transposition of the European Directive nr. 1991/250/CE, that and in all European Union, protects the rights over software under the scope of copyrights law (Author Rights). 

4. Owners of copyrights over software have the exclusive right to authorize the reproduction of the software and the distribution of it.

5. The site wwww.http://soft4gsm.com is a site where is being provided several products and software Nokia (please see: http://pt.soft4gsm.com/Cat_14.html with a call from the front page to Nokia's products http://pt.soft4gsm.com/). 

6. My clients never authorized such a provision nor allowed the reproduction of its software. 

7. Such non authorized use is considered a crime ("crime de usurpac
